Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Bay City in 1980...
Injured on 6/7/1981 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 4/23/1982 with a Swollen Ear, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 7/16/1982, off Eddie Harris (PIT)...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1983, off Lino Godsey (MAN)...
Traded from Bay City to Ashburn on 1/31/1987 (Going to Ash: C J. Jones, 2B A. Valvo. Going to BC: LF F. Aguilar)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Injured on 5/28/1989 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 2 weeks...
